DOC.brief_summary: Sixty subject take part study . The subject randomly assign 1:1 ratio two arm study . ( Group A : Solution Luffa Nasal Operculate 5mg/mL , Group B : saline ) . The subject use study medication comparative , accord randomization , treatment period 3 7 day . A follow-up visit make 15 day initiation treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Luffa Operculate Nasal Solution 5mg/mL Compared With Saline ( NaCl 09 % ) Relief Nasal Obstruction
